the_table.name: Pangea
the_table.truth: PANGEA IS THE TABLE. YOU DON'T BETRAY THE TABLE.

timeline_events.description: All continents unified into one landmass. The Table was whole.
The Table at maximum unity. All plates connected.
timeline_events.contracts_state: All contracts unified at The Table

timeline_events.description: The Table begins to separate. The Shell forms from the Seed.

timeline_events.description: The Table is broken. Plates separate. The Shell is complete.
Current plate positions. The Table's fragments.

timeline_events.contracts_state: Complex contracts across all plates and timelines

timeline.insight: The Table's unity decreased as it broke, but memory of unity remains
